welcome to KONG CITY

DigiKong is a collection of 4,500 Kong NFTs on the SOL blockchain – an ambitious ever-growing community with a long lasting future.

DigiKong Enterprise is based in Kong City, where 4,500 unique Kong City residents use their local currency to purchase bananas, blue chips, raffle tickets, and more. As a team of experienced engineers, developers, and marketers, we aim to provide value to the current bear market by building a platform for projects to collide and build in.

JOIN OUR DISCORD

OUR VISION

A SOLIDIFIED FUTURE

Kong City is built for builders. We're bridging gaps with Metaverse integration, studio partnerships, celebrity 1/1s, and more. Each individual Kong City resident represents the new wave of investors, a virtuous community built to see through a bear market and come out the other end with a new vision.
We're on a mission to strengthen Web3.

BANANA PARADISE

Who's bananas for Kong City? Home to 4500 Kongs, your Kong's future lies in our Metaverse, where everyone loves to hustle on the daily for those sweet bananas. This will be a social space initially, and a place for holders to connect and enjoy games and events with partner communities on Solana.
It's more than just a clean profile picture.

THE BIG APPLE

Immediately available post-mint, each kong can be staked for $DIGIKONG through our high quality, seamless, and non-custodial staking platform. Kong City's utility token will be live and available pre-mint on popular crypto exchanges, giving early investors access to all information regarding the DigiKong token. Communities onboard, holders gain.

Roadmap

Phase 1

  • Launch DigiKong Social Media
  • Creation Of Our Website
  • Promotion & Partnerships
  • Mint 4,500 Kongs

Phase 2

  • Secondary Listing on ME + Opensea 
  • Stake for $DK + Enter Raffles & Games
  • Kong DAO Partnership Games & Events
  • DigiMint Sniper & Mint Bots

Phase 3

  • PvP Games + Cash Prizes (Holders only)
  • Private Invites to Special Metaverse Events
  • Game Partnerships with Kong Characters

Phase 4

  • Kong City Metaverse Integration
  • Onboarding Projects & DAOs
  • And more to come...

FAQ

When is the mint date?

Mint date is Saturday, September 17, 2022.

What is the collection's total supply?

4,500.

What is the mint price?

Mint price is 0.77 SOL for WL and 0.8 SOL for Public.

How many mints per TX?

WL will be able to mint 2 and OG will be able to mint 2.

How can I get whitelisted?

Head over to our Discord: 📋︱how-to-wl

WE'RE BUILDING SOMETHING BIG

Your Kong is more than just a clean profile picture. Kong City is full of talented Web3 builders, developers, and artists looking to craft a solidified future for the world. We’re bridging gaps with Metaverse integration, studio partnerships, celebrity 1/1s, and more. Don’t miss out.

TEAM

Frosty Kong

Founder, Artist & Developer
Frosty Kong is the Founder, artist for DigiKong and a full-stack developer with 6+ years of experience. Frosty also runs a few eCommerce stores on the side. He loves coding, drawing, and dipping his toes into anything tech-related.
Read more

Liam Kong

CM & Marketing Lead
Liam Kong was previously a Web2 Marketing Manager and ad strategist for dropshipping businesses and indie game companies. Liam Kong is a CM, Marketing Lead, & advisor for DigiKong with 11 months of Web3 and NFT trading experience.
Read more

Johnny Kong

Project Engineer
Johnny Kong is an engineer with experience that extends beyond his technical skills. Johnny came up with the name of the project and will help craft the future of Kong City. He's been in Web3 for 7 months and is excited to add value to the team.
Read more

King Kong

Co-Founder & CMO
King Kong is an experienced Web3 marketing agent for blockchain projects and has been in the space for nearly 2 years. King Kong has worked independently as a marketer for over 30 projects on both ETH and SOL within the past 8 months.
Read more

Chronix Kong

Community Manager
Chronix is an experienced Twitter marketer aiming to help DigiKong secure partnerships, AMAs, and collabs with big projects in the ecosystem. He's excited to join the DigiKong team and bring extra value and experience to the table.
Read more

Steezy Kong

Developer
Steezy Kong is an experienced Web3 developer with 6 months of experience in Solana and 2 years overall. He's created various mint sites, staking platforms, and built P2E games for projects in the ecosystem. He's here to make Kong City #1.
Read more

Austin Kong

Project Manager
Austin Kong is a construction engineer and crypto connoisseur who has been in the industry since 2016. He enjoys football, NFTs, and traveling around the world. He's helped manage previous projects and is looking forward to the success of DigiKong.
Read more

Champi Kong

Project Engineer
Champi Kong, being the Project Engineer of DigiKong, has a strong background in real estate. Champi Kong is excited to expand his expertise into Web3 and create a strong vision for the future of the Metaverse on Solana.
Read more

Dylan Kong

CG Artist
Dylan Kong is a CG Artist and developer for the DigiKong team, creating various graphics for the upcoming 3D web-browser Metaverse. For Dylan, functionality and efficiency are key as opposed to extreme attention to detail.
Read more
